data.question: What is the chemical formula for NKU-FlexMOF-1?

data.answer: Micrometrics ASAP 2020M volumetric gas adsorption analyzer

data.question: At what temperature were the N2 adsorption measurements conducted for NKU-FlexMOF-1a?

Does NKU-FlexMOF-1 exhibit a higher adsorption capacity for CO2 or CH4 at 273 K?
Can NKU-FlexMOF-1a selectively separate C3H6 from C3H8?
What is the selectivity of C3H6 over C3H8 at 298 K according to the breakthrough experiment?
Is the adsorption behavior of NKU-FlexMOF-1a for C3H8 at higher temperatures typical or atypical?
Does NKU-FlexMOF-1a exhibit a guest-induced flexibility mechanism?
What is the main reason for the increase in sorption with temperature in NKU-FlexMOF-1a?
data.answer: Dynamic behavior of NKU-FlexMOF-1a where guest molecules subtly interacting with an adaptive framework lead to an induced-fit specific to each sorbate

data.question: What technique was used for single-crystal X-ray crystallography of NKU-FlexMOF-1?
data.answer: Rigaku SCX-mini diffractometer with Mo-KÎ± radiation

data.question: Is the NKU-FlexMOF-1 framework considered rigid?
What is the role of the F-group on the ligand in NKU-FlexMOF-1?
data.answer: The F-group on the ligand adds lability to the torsion, resulting in the stepwise N2 adsorption behavior at 77 K
